name: Auto Update HDFC BSE Data

on:
  schedule:
    - cron: "0 6 * * *"   # runs every day at 6 AM UTC
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  update:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: "3.11"

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: pip install -r requirements.txt

      - name: Run data extraction
        run: python hdfc_bse_extractor.py

      - name: Commit and push results
        run: |
          git config --global user.name "AutoUpdater"
          git config --global user.email "bot@example.com"
          git add HDFC_Bank_BSE_Data.xlsx
          git commit -m "Auto update BSE data" || echo "No changes to commit"
          git push
